messages.body: I can't download my purchased digital assets after payment

Hi there,

Thanks for reaching out about your recent purchase. Here are some helpful resources:

• Download issues? First, please clear your browser cache and try downloading again. If that doesn't work, try using a different browser.

• Need to restore access? Visit your Digital Library

• Technical requirements: Make sure you have sufficient storage space and a stable internet connection.

• Download limits: You can download your purchase up to 5 times within 30 days.

Check our Download Guide for more detailed instructions.

If you're still having trouble, please reply with:
1. The browser you're using
2. Any error messages you see
3. Screenshots if possible

We're here to help!
I've tried clearing my cache and using Chrome, but when I click the download button nothing happens. I just get a spinning wheel that never completes.

Hi Sarah,

I'm sorry you're having trouble downloading your assets. I've checked your account and can see that the files are quite large (2.5GB total). This might be causing the timeout issues you're experiencing.

I've generated a new set of download links that will let you download the assets in smaller chunks:

1. UI Elements (500MB)
2. Stock Photos (1GB)
3. Vector Graphics (1GB)

These links will be sent to your email in the next few minutes. They're valid for 7 days and can be downloaded individually.

Please let me know if you have any issues with the new links!

Best regards,
Michael

##- Please type your reply above this line -##
Your request (#45678) has been received and is being reviewed by our support staff.

To add additional comments, reply to this email.

Thank you for your patience. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

This email is a service from Creative Assets. Delivered by Support System
